no-duplicate-includes.errorMessage: Changelog file '%s' was included more than once

schema-name.errorMessage: Schema name does not follow pattern

file-name-no-spaces.errorMessage: Changelog filenames should not contain spaces

no-preconditions.errorMessage: Preconditions are not allowed in this project

has-comment.errorMessage: Change set must have a comment

has-context.errorMessage: Should have at least one context on the change set

isolate-ddl-changes.errorMessage: Should only have a single ddl change per change set

separate-ddl-context.errorMessage: Should have a ddl changes under ddl contexts

table-name.errorMessage: Table name does not follow pattern

table-name-length.errorMessage: Table '%s' name must not be longer than %d

object-name.errorMessage: Object name does not follow pattern

object-name-length.errorMessage: Object name '%s' must be less than %d characters

create-table-remarks.errorMessage: Create table must contain remark attribute

create-column-nullable-constraint.errorMessage: Add column must specify nullable constraint

create-column-no-define-primary-key.errorMessage: Add column must not use primary key attribute. Instead use AddPrimaryKey change type

modify-data-enforce-where.errorMessage: Modify data on table '%s' must have a where condition

modify-data-starts-with-where.errorMessage: Modify data where starts with where clause, that's probably a mistake

create-index-name.errorMessage: Index name does not follow pattern

unique-constraint-name.errorMessage: Unique constraint name does not follow pattern

primary-key-must-be-named.errorMessage: Primary key name does not follow pattern

primary-key-must-use-table-name.errorMessage: Primary key must use table name

foreign-key-must-use-base-and-referenced.errorMessage: Foreign key name must use base and referenced table name

drop-not-null-require-column-data-type.errorMessage: Drop not null constraint column data type attribute must be populated
